description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

v1.0.0.description: First public release. The 'defeat kaos' goal generates with a 95% success rate using the fuzzer tool by Eijebong. "All levels perfected" generates with a 50% success rate using the same tool, which I hope to improve with some of the tools in the next stable manual release.
v1.0.0.title: 1.0.0 release

v1.1.0.description:
* New option 'chapters_in_pool' which determines how many chapters will be in the item pool and have their locations in the location pool. 
* New option 'death_link'. You know what this one does.
* Updated the apworld to work with Manual Stable - 20250813.

This will be the last update with new features. I will continue to fix bugs if they show up, but no new options or content will be added.
v1.1.0.title: 1.1.0 release
